description._content: Our garden seems to have managed well despite numerous days of very wet weather this year! We are delighted to confirm that we will be holding another garden charity open day on Sunday September 23 10am-5pm with all proceeds to Walsall Mayor’s charity for Leukaemia and Lymphoma research. Admission fee £3 (children free). Please note there are some steps into the garden. In the next few days we will also add several 2013 open day dates to our web site www.fourseasonsgarden.co.uk Following the wettest ever April to June period in the UK since records began in 1910.......... the Met Office has today confirmed that our 2012 summer (June, July and August) has been the wettest summer in the UK since 1912! Somehow the main London Olympics escaped the rains and the weather forecast is now also fortunately good for the Paralympic Games! Above photo may be viewed in much larger size: www.flickr.com/photos/fourseasonsgarden/7895896080/sizes/...
